name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temu Video and Image Downloader Pro (TemuDaily)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download media content from Temu product pages, including images and videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Personal or Sensitive User Data**

We do not collect, handle, store or share any user data. Our extension is intended to provide functionality across Temu website and doesn't require specific host permissions.

Easily download product images and videos from Temu with just a few clicks. This extension is designed to help you grab high quality media from product pages on Temu, making it perfect for anyone who wants to save items for later or keep a collection of their favorite products.

Extension Features:

1. Download Main Product Image: Quickly save the main product image to your device.
2. Download Product Video: Capture the video associated with the product for offline viewing.
3. Download As Zip: Download all images and videos from a product page as a single zip file.
4.Download Variation Images as Zip: If a product has different variations (colors, sizes, etc.), you can download all the variation images in one zip file.

How It Works:

Visit Temu and navigate to a product page.
Click on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Choose the feature you need (Download main image, video, or zip files).
This is still a test phase, and we're actively working to add more features. We'd love to hear from you! Suggest new features to help us improve the extension.
This Chrome Extension is not affiliated with Temu group of companies.
